name.value: Put the NAME of your VNET here

resourceGroup.value: Put the name of your VNET RESOURCE GROUP here

location.value: Put the LOCATION you want your VNET here (e.g. "East US")

addressPrefix.value: Put the ADDRESS SPACE you want for your VNET here (e.g. 10.X.X.X/X)

subnet1Name.value: Put the NAME of your SUBNET here (e.g. "Devel-Web")

subnet1AddressPrefix.value: Put the ADDRESS SPACE you want for your VNET here (e.g. 10.X.X.X/X)

subnet2Name.value: Put the NAME of your SUBNET here (e.g. "Devel-db")
